On this page
Table of Contents for current page

Urls ​

This specifies which urls to include or exclude

Example ​

Include all urls that start with members/... however do not include members/dashboard

php
->urls(
        UrlsConfig::make()
            ->only([
                'members/*'
            ])
            ->except([
                'members/dashboard'
            ]
        ))
